translation: 尸检报告：洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯

original: "Died at 2:05PM. The cause of death was suffocation. The fire in the Common Room burnt the body too much to discern any specific wounds he might have suffered. However, a small trace of evocation magic and a burn mark were found on the victim’s left shoulder. This implies the body was hit with a fire-based evocation spell. \n \nTraces of abjuration magic were found on and around the body.”
translation: “死亡时间下午2:05。死因窒息。公共休息室的火势让尸体严重毁损，无法确定他是否曾有外伤。但是，尸体左肩留有一点塑能魔法的痕迹，还有烧焦痕迹。被害者可能曾被火系塑能法术攻击。\n\n尸体上和周围还留有防护魔法的痕迹。”
